explains: adj. 不安全的；危险的；不安稳的
wordGroup: unsafe condition 不安全条件；不安全状态；不安全情况

sentences.en: In the larger neighbourhood, I felt very unsafe.
sentences.cn: 在较大的街区，我感到非常不安全。

sentences.en: It was considered unsafe to release the prisoners.
sentences.cn: 释放这些囚犯被认为是危险的。

sentences.en: Discharge of raw sewage into the sea is unsanitary and unsafe.
sentences.cn: 向大海里倾倒污水既不卫生也不安全。
